Zuriel's staff is a magic weapon requiring level 78 Magic and Attack to wield.

In Deadman seasonals, it is part of Zuriel's equipment, a set of Ancient Warriors' equipment, and is dropped by any monster found in the Wilderness as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

 Attack bonuses
+13-1+65+18+0
 Defence bonuses
+5+7+4+18+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+72+0+10%+0List
Attack speedRange
1
square

Contents

  • 1 Passive effect
  • 2 Combat styles
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia

Passive effect[edit | edit source]

The Zuriel's staff has a passive effect which boosts Ancient Magicks combat spells when equipped:

  • Ice spells - 10% increased accuracy.
  • Blood spells - Hitpoints restoration is increased by 50%.
  • Smoke spells - Poison damage is increased by 100%.
  • Shadow spells - Attack drain is increased by 100%.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

Category: StaffCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
BashCrushAccurateAttack and Hitpoints+3 Attack
PoundCrushAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
FocusCrushDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence
SpellMagicDefensive AutocastMagic, Defence, and HitpointsNone
SpellMagicAutocastMagic and HitpointsNone

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

Zuriel's staff now gives its Ancient Magicks buffs in Last Man Standing.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • This staff functions differently than its RuneScape incarnation - the original did not have the Ancient Magicks-boosting passive effect, but allowed the user to cast Miasmic spells - a branch of spells on the Ancient Magicks spellbook that can only be cast with Zuriel's staff. Players affected by Miasmic spells have their Ranged and melee attack speeds temporarily halved, akin to Ice spells; the duration of this effect increases with the level of the spell.

[[File:Zuriel's staff detail.png|130px|left]]
'''Zuriel's staff''' is a magic weapon requiring level 78 [[Magic]] and [[Attack]] to wield. 

In [[Deadman Mode#Seasonal|Deadman seasonals]], it is part of [[Zuriel's equipment]], a set of [[Ancient Warriors' equipment]], and is dropped by any monster found in the [[Wilderness]] as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

==Passive effect==
The Zuriel's staff has a [[passive effect]] which boosts [[Ancient Magicks]] combat spells when equipped:
*[[Ice spells]] - 10% increased accuracy.
*[[Blood spells]] - [[Hitpoints]] restoration is increased by 50%.
*[[Smoke spells]] - [[Poison]] damage is increased by 100%.
*[[Shadow spells]] - [[Attack]] drain is increased by 100%.

{{Subject changes

|update = Below Ice Mountain
|change = Zuriel's staff now gives its Ancient Magicks buffs in Last Man Standing.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*This staff functions differently than its ''RuneScape'' incarnation - the original did not have the Ancient Magicks-boosting passive effect, but allowed the user to cast {{RSL|Miasmic spells}} - a branch of spells on the Ancient Magicks spellbook that can only be cast with Zuriel's staff. Players affected by Miasmic spells have their Ranged and melee attack speeds temporarily halved, akin to Ice spells; the duration of this effect increases with the level of the spell.
